The photo was originally posted on Imgur: com in August 2018 and resurfaced on Reddit in April 2018, indicating that it was not taken during the pandemic or even the year before it.
The caption of the photo on Imgur: com reads, "Father forgive them for they know not what they chew," which suggests that the image was intended as a joke rather than a serious protest against pandemic-era policies.
The Facebook post in question was flagge: s efforts to combat false news and misinformation, indicating that there were doubts about its authenticity.
The expert: s verdict states that protesters around the country have been pushing back against what they consider draconian restrictions, but the photo does not depict a genuine protest related to pandemic-era policies.
